translations: n.脾气暴躁的老泼妇；枯槁的老妇人

sentences.sentence: She was a mean old harridan.
Harridan! You'll see no mercy from me.
sentences.translation: 别指望我会对你手下留情！

sentences.sentence: I've always considered myself a pretty easy-going parent, and yet here they are telling me I'm a nay-saying harridan.
sentences.translation: 我一直认为我是一个脾气很好的妈妈，但是他们竟然说我是一个总说“不”的老巫婆。
